pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: NPR Illinois 91.9 UIS (Board of Trustees of the University of Illinois)
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Based in the Illinois state capital, most of the archive involves public affairs analysis programs, annual addresses, and news coverage.
pageContext._xxxcollectionExtentxtxt: Daily web postings of news stories (audio/photo/text) since 2011. 200 analog reel recordings. In-depth public policy reports (text) since 1975.
_xcollectionFormatsxtxtxxxcollectionForm: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
pageContext._xxxcollectionUsageStatementxtxt: May be used for informative purposes without charge. Political or marketing use subject to approval. Any use must site: NPR Illinois Archives, NPR Illinois 91.9 UIS, Springfield.
